mean_cn: n. 死刑，实行，执行，履行，演奏，表演
mean_en: the act of killing someone especially as punishment for a crime
word_etyma: execut处决 + ion名词后缀 → execution 死刑
short_phrase: The criminal was sentenced to execution.
sentence: He has been put to execution due to his broken English.
sentence_trans: 他因为英语太烂要被执行死刑了。
